name: LUNA 4 Facial Cleansing & Firming Massage for Sensitive Skin
categories: Skincare, High Tech Tools, Facial Cleansing Brushes
about: What it is:A customizable tool that lifts away dirt, oil, and makeup residue and offers firming facial massages that leave the skin clean and visibly healthier..What Else You Need to Know:This tool features manual cleansing and massage controls with customization in the FOREO app. The brush head has thin, soft touchpoints for a gentle, non-abrasive, yet effective cleanse and can be further personalized by cleansing intensity and firming massage routines..Clinical Results:Participants in a 28-day consumer trial reported the following benefits:
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-To unlock LUNA 4, pair with the FOREO For You app. .-Once paired and settings decided, device can be used without the app..-Remove all makeup, dampen skin, and apply your favorite cleanser..-Press the universal button to turn on the LUNA 4..-Choose between Gentle, Regular, or Deep Cleanse modes using the buttons on the device..-Cleanse using circular movements on cheeks and forehead, gliding up and down the nose..-Press and hold the button for three seconds to turn off device..-Rinse and pat your face dry. .-Apply other skincare products..-Access firming massage manually or follow the instructions on the FOREO app to activate the firming massage function.

reviews.review_title: Need an App to use this? Stupid. Also Mold growth
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This thing has the potential to grow mold. The current price of it at $400+ is ridiculous. I remember when I thought this product was expensive at $180.   It should come with a life time warranty at this price.  Another example of corporate greed and price gouging.   You can probably use a silicon pad - cheaply found on amazon and save your money.   Also this thing grows mold...even though it is supposed to be anti-microbial.
